name: Quick Draw
description: You can draw weapons with incredible speed, allowing you to seamlessly transition into combat
author: TRPG Line Community

data.effect: You Interact to draw a weapon as a free action when you roll initiative. If you are trained in the weapon's critical specialization group, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative check.
data.special: If you have the Quick Draw class feature, the circumstance bonus increases to +2
